presentation.title: HI MY NAME IS
presentation.my-description: I'm a 31 years old full stack developer with 1 year of experience. I want to be as creative as possible using my imagination and my skills in a project. My goal is to make a website pretty and adaptable by focusing on the best possible user experience. 🚀

myprojects-description: I present you here the different projects that I have been able to carry out.
